coming to you from ad stre event I'm
speaking with Todd bar Chief marketing
officer of Alfresco let's start by
talking about what Alfresco does okay
sure so thanks for having me um Alfresco
is the largest open- source content
management company in the world and our
content management platform really
focuses on business critical content
management document management workflow
um there's where there's a real business
case around improving a process and uh
making it easy iier for users or for the
company to manage content now how does
AWS help you well AWS helps us in a
number of ways so we're you know a
relatively new company with a new way to
look at content management um but it's
still been on premise software so AWS
has actually helped us in a couple of
ways in that we now have a public cloud
service that is running on top of AWS so
it's a a pure SAS version of our Fresco
but we also have a private Cloud sort of
um strategy around you know deploying on
premise al fresco on AWS and so we've
we've optimized al fresco so it works on
ec2 on RDS and S3 perfect and so um
together we have a really great you know
no matter what type of cloud a customer
wants to use we have a solution for them
okay now what do you think of reinvent
reinvent has been great so far it's a
you know for a new conference it has a
lot of energy it's it's good size and uh
We've made some great connections okay
are you going to get to attend any

at the partner sessions yesterday um but

thanks a lot Jeff enjoyed it
